00022 #ifndef _UUID_h
00023 #define _UUID_h
00024 
00025 #include "VRTObject.h"
00026 #include "HasFields.h"
00027 #include <string.h>    // required for memcpy(..) on GCC4.4/libc6 2.11.1
00028 
00029 #ifndef INTERNAL_UUID_LIB
00030 # define INTERNAL_UUID_LIB 0  // see comments at top of UUID class
00031 #endif
00032 
00033 #if INTERNAL_UUID_LIB == 0
00034 # include <uuid/uuid.h>
00035 # ifndef _UUID_UUID_H
00036 #  error *******************************************************
00037 #  error * Could not find system UUID library, try building with
00038 #  error * INTERNAL_UUID_LIB=1 or INTERNAL_UUID_LIB=2
00039 #  error *******************************************************
00040 # endif
00041 #else
00042   typedef unsigned char uuid_t[16];
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 namespace vrt {
00063   class UUID : public VRTObject, public HasFields {
00065     private: uuid_t uu; // uuid_t is a typedef for a char[16]
00066 
00068     public: ~UUID () { }
00069 
00071     public: UUID ();
00072 
00074     public: UUID (const UUID &uuid);
00075 
00077     public: UUID (const uuid_t uuid);
00078 
00079 #if INTERNAL_UUID_LIB != 1
00080 
00081     public: static UUID randomUUID ();
00082 #endif
00083 
00085     public: virtual bool isNullValue () const;
00086 
00087     using VRTObject::equals;
00088     public: virtual bool equals (const VRTObject &o) const;
00089 
00091     public: virtual bool equals (const UUID &uuid) const;
00092 
00094     public: inline virtual string toString () const {
00095       return getUUID();
00096     }
00097 
00099     public: uuid_t &getUUIDPointer() {
00100       return uu;
00101     }
00102 
00104     public: inline void getValue (void *buf) const {
00105       memcpy(buf, uu, 16);
00106     }
00107 
00109     public: inline void setValue (const void *buf) {
00110       memcpy(uu, buf, 16);
00111     }
00112 
00114     public: string getUUID () const;
00115 
00117     public: void setUUID (const string &uuid);
00118 
00120     public: void setUUID (const char *uuid);
00121 
00123     // Implement HasFields
00125     public: virtual int32_t   getFieldCount () const;
00126     public: virtual string    getFieldName  (int32_t id) const;
00127     public: virtual ValueType getFieldType  (int32_t id) const;
00128     public: virtual Value*    getField      (int32_t id) const __attribute__((warn_unused_result));
00129     public: virtual void      setField      (int32_t id, const Value* val);
00130   };
00131 
00132   namespace VRTMath {
00138     inline void packUUID (void *ptr, int32_t off, const UUID &val) {
00139       char *buf = (char*)ptr;
00140       val.getValue(&buf[off]);
00141     }
00142 
00148     inline void packUUID (vector<char> &buf, int32_t off, const UUID &val) {
00149       val.getValue(&buf[off]);
00150     }
00151 
00157     inline UUID unpackUUID (const void *ptr, int32_t off) {
00158       const char *buf = (const char*)ptr;
00159       UUID val;
00160       val.setValue(&buf[off]);
00161       return val;
00162     }
00163 
00169     inline UUID unpackUUID (const vector<char> &buf, int32_t off) {
00170       UUID val;
00171       val.setValue(&buf[off]);
00172       return val;
00173     }
00174   } END_NAMESPACE
00175 } END_NAMESPACE
00176 #endif /* _UUID_h */
